text: Alberto Cirio (born 6 December 1972) is an Italian politician. He was a Member of the European Parliament (MEP) from Italy from 2014 to 2019. He is a member of the right-wing Forza Italia. On 8 March 2020, he had tested positive for SARS-CoV-2. ==References== Category:1972 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Turin
title: Alberto Cirio
